column4: Hello. I got Ubuntu cd yesterday and installed it. I have been using windows Xp. Now i want to connect to internet using Ubuntu. I am using a braodband connection. How can I configure it in Ubuntu.
Can Any one help me?
should work out of the box, what specific problem are you having
it works out of the box
you only need one of those wires, not both (and you should use the rj45)
yes
forget that for now, we'll get there
just type ifconfig -a
run it, and then go to a website and it'll probably work
now go to a website
yes
where are you at now for progress
and do you have an IP for either of your interfaces?
i asked you a question a while ago
if you type ifconfig -a, do any of your interfaces have an ip address other than 169.xxx.xxx.xxx
what happens if you type dhclient eth1
ok, and then what happens if you go to a website on your browser
ok, in terminal type dhclient eth0 then
and then what?
use "sudo dhclient eth0"
no
you pretty much never have to restart linux
what does your windows connection have to do with this, aren't you on linux?
